meanings.definition: To exceed in value or worth.
meanings.sent1: She outvalued all other candidates with her exceptional skills.
meanings.sent2: The rare painting outvalued all the other items in the auction.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's lemonade stand was outvaluing the big store next door!
meanings.sent4: His kindness outvalued any material possessions.
meanings.sent5: The sun outvaluing the moon in brightness is a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: To surpass in importance or significance.
meanings.sent1: His dedication to the cause outvalued his personal interests.
meanings.sent2: The safety of the passengers outvalued the speed of the train.
meanings.sent3: The cat's laziness was outvaluing the dog's energy levels.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom outvalued her age in the eyes of the council.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the crowd outvaluing the sound of thunder was deafening.
